observation: Navigating to https://classiccitytech.com/ returned status code 200

Professional IT Support - Classic City Technology  Agent The agent requires no installation. Simply download it, save it somewhere you can find it, and then run it. You will be given an ID and password to allow for the remote support. Pass these along to us, sit back, and let us fix things up for you. Host The host is an installation that stays running on your computer so you can request our assistance without even being at your computer. All you need to do is provide us with your ID and password and to leave the computer on. We’ll handle the rest. Helpdesk Not all problems need a “drop everything and help” response. Submitting tickets alerts all of us instantly, lets us research and reach out with answers (typically within minutes over email for simple issues), and lets us better plan our visits for optimal efficiency. Download the Agent Download the Host Submit a Ticket × Professional Technical Support for Homes and Businesses — Call 706-549-9300 info@classiccitytech.com Home Products and Services Computers Consultation Managed IT Network Engineering Specialty Services Surveillance Websites The Archives Partners Testimony Directions Contact Support Select Page Welcome to Classic City Technology! Whatever your needs, whatever your goals, We’ll get you there! It’s About Time Technology Worked FOR You. We can help. We are a full service solution provider for modern day technology needs, serving the Northeast Georgia region since 2004. Based in the “Classic City” of Athens, Georgia we provide computer and network service, products, engineering and Microsoft Certified Professional level technical support. From our own CCT PCs & Servers, Office/House calls, to International Network Engineering and design, we can handle most any need that may arise in today’s fast paced and evolving world, for home or business. Experience service and support like it should be, and join our many satisfied clients. Virus got your computer down? We can clear it up and keep your data. Plus provide you with solutions to help prevent future infections. Don’t let a virus keep you from using your computer to its fullest. We also provide security camera systems, start to finish. From designing the camera layout best for your location to incorporating an existing non-IP based system into a more modern IP system. We even try to maintain a blog as a service and thank you to all of our customers. Useful information published as we are able. Defending your files from hackers, how to avoid malware (and why antivirus doesn’t catch a lot of it), staying private on the internet, and more. Check out below for our latest blog post or visit the archives to read all of them. Check out our latest Articles of Techiness!! The Biggest Data Breach Yet Part 2 The Biggest data breach yet: Part 2 (Hey look, we didn't forget to follow up that first post... we just got really busy. On a good note, our security analyst was again a recognized member of the beta-testing group for the upcoming 2020 release of Bitdefender!)So now... Read More The Biggest data breach yetYour emails aren't private. Your messages aren't private. Your conversations aren't even private.It's national privacy day! They say write about what you care about. So here we are: part 1 of 2 for the biggest data breach you've never heard... IT vs Software Support -A quick aside from the author- Hello everyone, good to be back at the Articles. For those of you who aren't following our Facebook feed or getting our emails (if you aren't, I do hope you'll sign up), I have been occupied acting as a beta tester/analyst of the 2019... Hide Your House From Google How to Hide Your House from Google   As you may have guessed from previous posts, we like protecting our privacy. Sometimes this can come with some pretty real-world benefits too beyond what we think some agency may or man not be monitoring. Check out this guest... Security Privacy Anonymity These three concepts should go hand-in-hand, right? The truth is, they don't. In fact, as any single one of these increases, the others tend to decrease. To make matters worse, people often do not understand the level to which privacy is now being violated. So that... Previous Next 1 2 3 Building a new one or fixing your old one Networking Making sense of all those wires Security Keep an eye on your property Making these a thing of the past So who are we and what do we do? Great question! We are a small, family owned business consisting of a group of very highly skilled, professional, and (we like to believe) personable nerds. Whatever your needs, we can get them done. From wall-mounting a television to full network administration for your business, we handle it all. Even up to and including designing and deploying a war-on-terror network for our government! No scope is too big or too small for us to handle. In a nutshell, if it involves technology, give us a shout. The only real exception is that we do not handle professional coding (cudos to the coders out there but we just aren’t into that). And unlike the big guys, we aren’t looking for any get-rich-quick schemes or ways to lock you into contracts. Our driving ideal is to provide service of such quality that you want to continue using us without the need of binding contracts. We will get to know you and your team on a personal basis in order to provide completely customized and effective support. And you’ll know us. No more random people coming in, doing things without speaking to you, and disappearing again.  Built, refurbished, and repaired  Take security into your own hands, at home or at work  Wired or wireless, copper or fiber  Website Design Website design from start to finish and beyond w Answers to all of your questions  Firewalls, Audits, and Awareness Training  Full management of your IT infrastructure u Fill out a ticket or get remote assistance With Our Years of Experience, We Will Solve Your Problems It’s hard working for a business that doesn’t treat clients fairly. Sadly, many businesses use their clients’ lack of understanding against them purely for increased profit. You won’t find that at Classic City Technology. The owner founded the business on the ideal of being able to go home and smile when he looked into the mirror, knowing that he had done everything he could to take care of his clients as family rather than a source of money. This ideal has driven the business since it was founded in 2004 and still holds strong today. We are a small family owned business where you aren’t just a customer, you’re family. We take a professional, service-oriented approach to all jobs. It’s done once and done right. Rather than advertising, we leave our work to speak for us and generate all business purely from word-of-mouth reviews. If you ever find yourself needing work or you need help figuring out what actually needs to be done (and not what some big store told you should be done for a big price), give us a call. We are always happy to lend a hand. “…Classic City Tech helped me defeat problems that my security software couldn’t handle, and on two of those occasions, help was off-hours.” Alan G “…Your after-market service blows away your competition. Your quick response, not only to any equipment problems, but especially to ‘user’ problems has decrease stress levels for me on so many occasions. You are my computer hero.” Gwen B “Thanks so very much for your help! I really, really appreciate what you do and the “service-oriented” way you do it.” Rick S Please never hesitate to call us for anything. ADDRESS 8771 Macon Hwy Ste C WORKING HOURS Mon – Fri: 9am – 5pm CONTACT 706-549-9300 Update Trend Micro Software Privacy Policy © 2024 Classic City Technology Follow Facebook
